snippet: Prosecutors in Cairo opened a criminal investigation on Tuesday into allegations that a popular television comedian, Bassem Youssef, has taken special aim at ultraconservative Islamists on his program.
abstract: Prosecutors in Cairo open criminal investigation into allegations that popular Egyptian television comedian Bassem Youssef, who has taken special aim at ultraconservative Islamists on his program, insulted Pres Mohamed Morsi during his satirical monologues.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Cairo opened a criminal investigation on Tuesday into allegations that a popular television comedian, Bassem Youssef, has taken special aim at ultraconservative Islamists on his program.

headline.seo: Comedian Accused of Insulting Egyptian President to Be Investigated
headline.main: Egypt: Prosecutor Opens Criminal Investigation Against Comedian Accused of Insulting the President
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Prosecutor Opens Criminal Investigation Against Comedian Accused of Insulting the President
